quote.registrar: Computershare Hong Kong Investor Services Ltd.
quote.issuer_name: CSSC Offshore & Marine Engineering (Group) Co. Ltd. - H Shs
quote.nm: CSSC Offshore & Marine Engineering (Group) Co. Ltd. - H Shs
quote.summary: CSSC Offshore & Marine Engineering Group Co Ltd is a China-based company that produces and manufactures comprehensive marine and defense equipment. The Company operates its businesses through four segments: the Shipbuilding and Related Business segment, the Steel Structure Business segment, the Ship Repair and Related Business segment, and the Other segment. The Company's main products include defense equipment products represented by military ships, coast guard equipment, official ships, and others, marine and offshore products represented by feeder container ships, dredgers, offshore engineering platforms, wind power installation platforms, and others, and marine and offshore application business products represented by energy equipment, engineering machinery, and industrial Internet platforms. The Company mainly operates its businesses in the domestic and overseas markets.
